title: Best of the Program | Guest: Jared Kushner | 8/25/22
description:
Glenn lays out how much President Biden's student loan forgiveness will cost taxpayers, the unconstitutionality of the move, and how much it will make everything worse. Glenn goes through some of the top news stories, like Biden putting America last and forced sterilizations. Former Senior Advisor to President Trump Jared Kushner joins to discuss his new memoir "Breaking History" and his involvement in the Abraham Accords. 
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
